Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Pn-Imn with black painted detail: a striated lappet-wig tied with a fillet, a modelled face(worn) with traced features, a collar and crossed arms in relief with bracelets holding two hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs.
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
